Garden of Eden 101.name: Garden of Eden 101
Garden of Eden 101.description: The simplest Garden of Eden configuration (101) - has no predecessor

Glider.name: Glider
Glider.description: Simple glider pattern with 4 cells in a line. Creates moving patterns in 1D automaton.

1/3 Glider.name: 1/3 Glider
1/3 Glider.description: 1/3 density glider pattern with 7 cells. Creates moving patterns with 1/3 cell density.

Spider.name: Spider
Spider.description: Six active cells arranged in a spider-like pattern. Creates interesting web-like formations.
